setup.errorNoHDD:
This device is intended to work with hard disk drive installed.
Please turn off the device and install a hard disk drive.
setup.errorNoNetwork:
This device needs network connection to work.
Please connect it to your local network ot Internet

passwordRequirements.minLengthMessage: Password must contain at least 8 characters
passwordRequirements.requiredMessage:
Use only latin letters, numbers and keyboard 
 symbols, avoid leading and trailing spaces.
passwordRequirements.weakMessage:
Use numbers, symbols in different case
 and special symbols to make your password stronger
passwordRequirements.commonMessage: This password is in top most popular passwords in the world

settings.confirmRestart: Do you want to restart server now?
settings.confirmRestoreDefault: Do you want to clear database and settings? This process will take some time and server will be restarted afterwards.
settings.unexpectedError: Can't proceed with action: unexpected error has happened
settings.restartNeeded:
All changes saved. New settings will be applied after restart. 
 Do you want to restart server now?
settings.confirmHardwareRestart: Do you want to restart server's operation system?
settings.confirmRestoreSettings: Do you want to restore all server's settings? Archive will be saved, but network settings will be reset.
settings.confirmRestoreSettingsNotNetwork: Do you want to restart all server's settings? Archive and network settings will be saved.
settings.confirmDisconnectFromCloudTitle: Do you want to disconnect your system? It will be unreachable from the internet then.
settings.confirmChangePasswordTitle: Are you sure you want to change system password? It will affect admin user and root password for some servers
settings.nx1ControlHint: Client application was started. Use a keyboard or mobile application to control it.

join.systemIsUnreacheble: System is unreachable or doesn't exist.
join.incompatibleVersion: System is unreachable, doesn't exist or has incompatible version.
join.wrongUrl: Unable to connect to specified server.
join.newSystemError: Can't merge systems. Remote system is not configured yet
join.safeMode: Can't merge systems. Remote system is in safe mode.
join.configError: Can't merge systems. Maybe one of the systems is in safe mode.
join.cloudError: Can't merge systems. Dependent system is connected to cloud. You need to disconnect it first.
join.cloudBothError: Can't merge systems. Both systems are connected to cloud. You need to disconnect one first.
join.cloudHostConflict: Can't merge systems, because servers are built with different cloud hosts
join.licenceError: Warning: You are about to merge Systems with START licenses. As only 1 START license is allowed per System after your merge you will only have 1 START license remaining. If you understand this and would like to proceed please click Merge to continue.

navigaion.cannotGetUser: Server failure: cannot retrieve current user data

fileUpload.started: Updating successfully started. It will take several minutes
fileUpload.upToDate: Updating failed. The provided version is already installed.
fileUpload.invalidFile: Updating failed. Provided file is not a valid update archive.
fileUpload.incompatibleSystem: Updating failed. Provided file is targeted for another system.
fileUpload.extractionError: Updating failed. Extraction failed, check available storage.
fileUpload.installationError: Updating failed. Couldn't execute installation script.
